original_text:
What misery is mine!
I am like one who gathers summer fruit
    at the gleaning of the vineyard;
there is no cluster of grapes to eat,
    none of the early figs that I crave.
korean_text: 재앙이로다 나여 나는 여름 과일을 딴 후와 포도를 거둔 후 같아서 먹을 포도송이가 없으며 내 마음에 사모하는 처음 익은 무화과가 없도다

sentences.original_text: I am like one who gathers summer fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여름 과일을 거두는 사람과 같으니

sentences.original_text: at the gleaning of the vineyard;
sentences.korean_translation: 포도원의 남은 열매를 거두는 것과 같다

sentences.original_text: there is no cluster of grapes to eat,
none of the early figs that I crave.
